name: Kevin Reece
title: President
bio: Kevin is a Senior studying Computer Science with a minor in Business Management. He has worked as Head TA for CS 428 (Software Engineering) and as a Program Manager Intern for Microsoft. He is currently working as an Associate for Ironwood Experts, LLC assisting with software patent litigation cases. After he graduates, Kevin will pursue a double Master's degree in Software Engineering and Business Administration.

name: Caleb Tonkinson
title: Vice President, External Operations
bio: Caleb is currently getting a Bachelors in Computer Science with a minor in Business Management and is planning on getting an MBA a couple years after graduation. He currently works as a Business Intelligence Engineer for the LDS Church. He is a voracious reader of books about practically any subject and enjoys playing soccer, traveling and discussing and researching business ideas with his brother and friends.

name: Adrian Foong
title: Chief Networking Officer
bio: Adrian is a Computer Science major. He has spent most of his career testing and refining the user experience for various projects. He gets awesome companies to attend BYU ACM events so that they give our students jobs. Outside of ACM, he enjoys being a spy in The Resistance board game.

name: Derek Argueta
title: Chief Technology Officer
bio: Derek is a fourth-year computer science major. His interests lay in distributed systems, system programming, performance engineering, production engineering, and infastructure design. He frequently attends hackathons and enjoys reading, playing the upright bass, and traveling. His favorite books are the Pragmatic Programmer and CLRS. He also wants a Tesla. Really badly.

name: Emma Reece
title: Chief Marketing Officer
bio: Emma is a Advertising major and is a Junior at BYU. She has been the Program Director of Advertising and Branding Research at BYUSA for the past year and is excited to apply her knowledge of branding, advertising, design, and marketing to BYU ACM.
